channel.title: PISTOL - Aneurysm WIP [Darkstep DnB]
channel.description: https://soundcloud.com/pistol69/aneurysm-wip I haven’t made any tunes in ages as I’ve had a bit of a writers block, here’s a sneak peak of something new from me, chopped up breaks and dark basslines, would love to know what you guys think if it so far.

item.title: PISTOL - Aneurysm WIP [Darkstep DnB]

item.description:
I’d still like to hear some of that’s ok man?

item.title: PISTOL - Aneurysm WIP [Darkstep DnB]
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
Lol that’s the bad part I’m terrible with lyrics! Big part of the reason I don’t do my own and just use samples from elsewhere. My Jamaican patois is so rusty it needs so much work haha

item.description:

item.title: PISTOL - Aneurysm WIP [Darkstep DnB]
item.dc:creator: iammane
item.description:
I put a one liner in Capzuul lol… the vocal snippet was me, pitched down a tiny bit.

I’d like to do more in the future but I’m honestly not good enough to do anything other than string together the occasional “STEREO MURDA” or similar lol

At the risk of sounding like a total, total… well… I can’t write that word here. I’ve been practicing my Jamaican patois lol… samples are NOT that easy to find and the ones out there have a string of licensing terms attached to them.
